articles.description: Kent fielder Harry Finch violated Law 28 of the MCC's Laws of Cricket in a bizarre incident in the One-Day Cup final against Lancashire, which Kent won by 21 runs
articles.content: There was a bizarre incident in the One-Day Cup final at Trent Bridge, when Lancashire were awarded five penalty runs after Kent fielder Harry Finch decided to pick up wicketkeeper Ollie Robinson's g… [+1884 chars]

articles.title: ICC T20 World Cup 2022: Gautam Gambhir Gives Clear Answer To Rishabh Pant vs Dinesh Karthik Debate Regarding India's Probable XI For The Marquee Tournament - Cricket Addictor
articles.description: ICC T20 World Cup 2022: Gautam Gambhir Gives Clear Answer To Rishabh Pant vs Dinesh Karthik Debate Regarding India's Probable XI For The Marquee Tournament
articles.content: Former India opener Gautam Gambhir made a strong remark regarding the Dinesh Karthik vs Rishabh Pant debate after the squad for the ICC T20 World Cup 2022 was announced. While there were no major sur… [+1727 chars]

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: BCCI set to introduce tactical substitutions in Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy T20s - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The Impact Player concept is set to offer teams greater tactical flexibility than the BBL's X-Factor rule
articles.content: The BCCI is likely to introduce the Impact Player rule to the IPL if it works smoothly in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy  •  BCCI/IPL
